short_summary: Training Engine supply, delivery, and installation
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Training Engine

#### Reference Number: WS3553235511
#### Date of Publication: August 30, 2022

The Department of Public Works and Government Services, on behalf of the Department of National Defence, is seeking a supplier to provide, deliver, and install a training engine at the Atlantic Stadacona facility in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

#### Tender Overview
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
* Unspsc Classification: Marine craft systems and subassemblies (25111900)

#### Key Dates
* Tender Closing Date: September 22, 2022, 14:00 PDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: November 8, 2022
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

#### Bidding Requirements
To be considered, bidders must submit the following documentation by the tender closing date:

* A comprehensive bid package
* Supporting documentation and proof of bid submission requirements
* Any additional information as stipulated in the notice

All bids submitted after the specified closing time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contractual Requirements
* The selected supplier will be required to meet the needs of the Department of National Defence, Royal Canadian Navy.
* Specific delivery and installation requirements will be detailed in the contract awarded to the successful bidder.

#### Contact Information
To obtain further guidance, please contact:
Clara Dumay, Contracting Officer
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [clara.dumay@tpspsc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:clara.dumay@tpspsc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Notice URL: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13969261?extsite=MTM5NjkyNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

 REMARKS:
* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.
* The tender is limited to Canadian suppliers.  [/end of Remarks]  Regards, Clara Dumay, .)
